doc.title: The Help
doc.plot: Raymond Velasco has moved his pregnant wife Abigail and teenage son Nicholas from the United States back to his ancestral home in the Philippines. After arriving Abigail is haunted by the strange presence of a young woman and a small boy, both of whom only Abigail seems to see. Abigail soon discovers the boy and woman are ghosts determined to terrorize her and her unborn twins. Abigail attempts to unravel the mystery of why the dead are haunting her, even as they increasingly threaten her pregnancy and health. Upon learning he is responsible for the haunting, Raymond is forced to face his past and the dead in order to save his family and stop his legacy of sin.
